vm_options: ### - Informs Java functions that we are running in the extended mode
### - Provides ability of remote debugging from IntelliJ IDEA or other IDE.
### - 'false' option sets 'softer' requirements for integration of JEP and NumPy Python packages:
### even if you installed them in the wrong order, SciChains will still use Python,
### but some Python-based functions may not work correctly in that case.
### When using the built-in Python (from the 'python' folder), this property is set to true by default.
